verses.verse: And in those <S%G5025><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> when the number of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> was multiplied, <S%G4129><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> a murmuring <S%G1112><s%> of the Grecians <S%G1675><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the Hebrews, <S%G1445><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> their widows <S%G5503><s%> were neglected <S%G3865><s%> in the daily <S%G2522><s%> ministration. <S%G1248><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> to them, and said, <S%G2036><s%> It is not reason <S%G701><s%> that we should leave <S%G2641><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and serve <S%G1247><s%> tables. <S%G5132><s%>

Why, <S%G3767><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> look <S%G1980><s%> you out among <S%G1537><s%> you seven <S%G2033><s%> men <S%G435><s%> of honest report, <S%G3140><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> and wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we may appoint <S%G2525><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> business. <S%G5532><s%>
But we will give <S%G4342><s%> ourselves continually <S%G4342><s%> to prayer, <S%G4335><s%> and to the ministry <S%G1248><s%> of the word. <S%G3056><s%>

And the saying <S%G3056><s%> pleased <S%G700><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude: <S%G4128><s%> and they chose <S%G1586><s%> Stephen, <S%G4736><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> and of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> and Philip, <S%G5376><s%> and Prochorus, <S%G4402><s%> and Nicanor, <S%G3527><s%> and Timon, <S%G5096><s%> and Parmenas, <S%G3937><s%> and Nicolas <S%G3532><s%> a proselyte <S%G4339><s%> of Antioch: <S%G491><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> they set <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the apostles: <S%G652><s%> and when they had prayed, <S%G4336><s%> they laid <S%G2007><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> them.

And the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> increased; <S%G837><s%> and the number <S%G706><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> multiplied <S%G4129><s%> in Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> greatly; <S%G4970><s%> and a great <S%G4183><s%> company <S%G3793><s%> of the priests <S%G2409><s%> were obedient <S%G5219><s%> to the faith. <S%G4102><s%>

And Stephen, <S%G4736><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> and power, <S%G1411><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%> and miracles <S%G4592><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> there arose <S%G450><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> of the Libertines, <S%G3032><s%> and Cyrenians, <S%G2956><s%> and Alexandrians, <S%G221><s%> and of them of Cilicia <S%G2791><s%> and of Asia, <S%G773><s%> disputing <S%G4802><s%> with Stephen. <S%G4736><s%>
And they were not able <S%G2480><s%> to resist <S%G436><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and the spirit <S%G4151><s%> by which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke. <S%G2980><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> they suborned <S%G5260><s%> men, <S%G435><s%> which said, <S%G3004><s%> We have heard <S%G191><s%> him speak <S%G2980><s%> blasphemous <S%G989><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> and against God. <S%G2316><s%>

And they stirred <S%G4787><s%> up the people, <S%G2992><s%> and the elders, <S%G4245><s%> and the scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and came <S%G2186><s%> on him, and caught <S%G4884><s%> him, and brought <S%G71><s%> him to the council, <S%G4892><s%>

And set <S%G2476><s%> up false <S%G5571><s%> witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> which said, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G5127><s%> man <S%G444><s%> ceases <S%G3973><s%> not to speak <S%G2980><s%> blasphemous <S%G989><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> and the law: <S%G3551><s%>

For we have heard <S%G191><s%> him say, <S%G3004><s%> that this <S%G5126><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> shall destroy <S%G2647><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> and shall change <S%G236><s%> the customs <S%G1485><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> us.

And all <S%G537><s%> that sat <S%G2516><s%> in the council, <S%G4892><s%> looking <S%G816><s%> steadfastly <S%G816><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him, saw <S%G1492><s%> his face <S%G4383><s%> as it had been the face <S%G4383><s%> of an angel. <S%G32><s%>
